alert.note: Alert for Boone; Campbell; Grant; Kenton; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 5:00PM EDT until August 25 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Kenton County in northern Kentucky... Southern Campbell County in northern Kentucky... Southern Boone County in northern Kentucky... Northeastern Grant County in northern Kentucky... Northwestern Pendleton County in northern Kentucky... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 500 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Walton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Florence, Independence, Erlanger, Walton, Crittenden, Atwood, Richwood, Grants Lick, Bank Lick, Morning View, Northcutt, Bracht, Gardnersville, White Villa, Fiskburg, Ricedale, Piner, White Tower, and Verona. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 75 and 77. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 166 and 177. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
